scripts.docker:build: cd ../../ && ver && docker build -t mqtt-influxdb-agent:%npm_package_version% -f projects/mqtt-influxdb-agent/Dockerfile . || docker build -t mqtt-influxdb-agent:$npm_package_version -f projects/mqtt-influxdb-agent/Dockerfile .
scripts.docker:publish: cd ../../ && ver && docker buildx build --push --platform linux/arm/v7,linux/arm64/v8,linux/amd64 -t woifes/mqtt-influxdb-agent:%npm_package_version% -f projects/mqtt-influxdb-agent/Dockerfile . || docker buildx build --push --platform linux/arm/v7,linux/arm64/v8,linux/amd64 -t woifes/mqtt-influxdb-agent:$npm_package_version -f projects/mqtt-influxdb-agent/Dockerfile .
